mapper.select:
select ci.id, ci.user_code, ci.pharmacy_code, ci.`type`, ci.content, ci.create_date, ei.name as enterpriseName, ei.images as enterpriseImages, ei2.name as expertName, ei2.images as expertImages from chat_info ci left join pharmacy_info ei on (ei.code = ci.pharmacy_code) left join user_info ei2 on (ei2.code = ci.user_code) where 1 = 1
AND ei.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{chatInfo.pharmacyName},'%')
AND ei2.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{chatInfo.userName},'%')
order by ci.create_date desc

select ci.id, ci.user_code, ci.pharmacy_code, ci.`type`, ci.content, ci.create_date,
ei2.name, ei2.images
ei.name, ei.images,
from chat_info ci
left join user_info ei on (ei.code = ci.user_code)
left join pharmacy_info ei2 on (ei2.code = ci.pharmacy_code)
where 1 = 1
and ci.pharmacy_code = #{userCode}
and ci.user_code = #{userCode}
group by ci.user_code
group by ci.pharmacy_code
order by create_date desc

select mi.id, mi.user_code, mi.pharmacy_code, mi.`type`, mi.content, mi.create_date, ei.name as expertName, ei2.name as enterpriseName, ei2.images as enterpriseImages from ( select * from chat_info where user_code = #{ expertCode } AND pharmacy_code = #{ enterpriseCode } ) mi left join user_info ei on (ei.code = mi.user_code) left join pharmacy_info ei2 on (ei2.code = mi.pharmacy_code) ORDER BY mi.create_date asc
